definition.text: The master branch in the Superalgos repo features the latest stable version, while the develop branch features the version in development!

paragraphs.text: Superalgos is constantly improving. At some point, you may wish to try the software version in the develop branch. Maybe there is a new feature, or a fix for a bug that hasn't got to the master branch yet...
Or you may wish to submit a contribution, which must always be sent to the develop branch!
Scroll down the Docs page to the footer and select Develop as your Contributions Branch! It's the option on the right-hand side, not in the center!
